key_features: Async cookies(), headers(), draftMode() — breaking change from v14
Params and searchParams are now Promises
Temporary synchronous fallback available (deprecated, removed in v16)
forbidden() and unauthorized() for auth errors
breaking_changes: cookies(), headers(), draftMode() are now async — must use await
params and searchParams are now Promises — must use await
Default caching changed from force-cache to no-store for fetch
Route handlers are no longer cached by default
notes: cookies() and headers() now require await — sync fallback exists but is deprecated
params type is Promise<{ slug: string }>, NOT { slug: string }
middleware.ts is still the correct file name (not proxy.ts)
after() is available from next/server for post-response work
cacheTag and cacheLife use unstable_ prefix in v15
